attributes.description:
1st Installment  October 2022
Here are some of what the team at Renault Durban offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description: We at KIA RANDBURG pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.
